entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
